items.desc:
Following a serious motorcycle accident resulting in multiple trauma, one of the victims was in critical condition. 
To save his life, an amputation of his leg proved essential. 
Thanks to the rapid intervention and professionalism of the Nurse Hilfe Menschen Internationale medical team, the operation was able to be carried out in conditions allowing her to preserve her life and give her a chance for a future.
